an4.9:1.1: “Mendicants, there are four things that give rise to craving in a mendicant.
an4.9:1.6: or rebirth in this or that state.
an4.9:1.7: These are the four things that give rise to craving in a mendicant.
an4.9:2.2: as they transmigrate on this long journey.
an4.9:2.3: They go from this state to another,
an4.9:3.2: that craving is the cause of suffering—
an4.9:3.3: rid of craving, free of grasping,
an4.9:3.4: a mendicant would go forth mindfully.”
